alert.note: Alert for Boulder And Jefferson Counties Below 6000 Feet, West Broomfield County; North Douglas County Below 6000 Feet, Denver, West Adams and Arapahoe Counties, East Broomfield County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 26 at 3:01PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Arapahoe, Denver, northeastern Jefferson and western Adams Counties through 345 PM MDT... At 301 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over northwestern Northglenn, or 13 miles north of Denver, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Denver, Aurora, Thornton, southeastern Arvada, southeastern Westminster, Centennial, Commerce City, Northglenn, Brighton, eastern Englewood, southeastern Wheat Ridge, Greenwood Village, Federal Heights, southwestern Denver International Airport, Buckley SFB and Todd Creek. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare for sudden gusty winds. Secure loose objects and move to a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Boulder And Jefferson Counties Below 6000 Feet, West Broomfield County; North Douglas County Below 6000 Feet, Denver, West Adams and Arapahoe Counties, East Broomfield County
